name: The Fateslayer
description: Long ago, there were two titans that created the world. Fate, and Time. Fate could place ideas in mortals’ brains, and Time could control the passage of time. They had children, and lived as a happy family. But one day… Fate became jealous of Time’s power, and convinced his children to try to kill her. Time could see many possible futures, so she was prepared. She crafted a sword called the Fateslayer. The family battled for millennia, until Time sealed Fate in the blade, and she banished her children. Eons have passed since then, and to this day, Time rules the heavens alone. And that is where our story of a young man on a quest for redemption begins...
